ygData.subject: Re: RE: Mana Madness
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t have a paw or a shield, but I would like to get both.  I would love to get the Kedge Totem as well.  I may be switching back to 1HB (Screaming Mace
ygData.messageBody:
I don't have a paw or a shield, but I would like to get both. I would love
to get the Kedge Totem as well. I may be switching back to 1HB (Screaming
Mace until I can get a tainted morning star) because I finally completed the
Testament of Venear. What a miserable time that was.. I had to camp that
NPC for 7 hours before he finally spawned... ugh. Guess I should get used
to it though, if I want any cleric armor. Maybe sitting around is
Verant's idea of a fun time =)

Does anybody know how much mana you get from one point of wisdom? I'm
trying to figure out if I have more mana carrying an observer staff (+5
wisdom +30 mana) or the testament of Venear (+10 Wisdom +10 mana). Since
the staff is 2H, I can't use both...

-Eachann Bronzeleaf
-Cleric of Tunare, Tarrew Marr
-----Original Message-----
From: Mr. J Daniels <warpig@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, November 09, 1999 5:26 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] RE: Mana Madness


>From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
>
>There is a totem that is +18 wisdom.
>I too used an observer staff for quite a while. However as soon as you
>can get a charred guardian shield or paw of opallo, you'll want to switch
>back to a non wisdom 1h weapon. (The shield and paw are more wisdom than
>the staff).
>
>I used an enamelled black mace with the shield, or paw with the shield,
>until I got one of the +6 wis ruined maces in kith. Now I never use the
>shield, I go with the mace in one hand and the paw in the other.
>
>
>> From: "Jeff Portwine" <jdport@...>
>>
>> LOL.. are you suggesting that you have a +18 Wisdom 1HB weapon?? What do
you use?
>> I am hoping to get one of those tarnished morning stars that the undead
in Kithicore carry,
>> so that I can have a 1HB with +Wisdom... but for now i'm sticking with my
2HB Staff of
>> Observers which is a very nice weapon.. as fast as a mace, higher damage,
and +Wis/+mana.
>> It's only disadvantage is that it is 2H...
>>
>> I'm level 26, what do you use being up near 50?
>>
>> -Eachann Bronzeleaf
>> -Cleric of Tunare, Tarrew Marr
>>
>> >
>> > If I can find a +18 wis 2HB weapon, I just might give it a try LOL!
>> >
>> > Ailamil Faithbringer
>> > Silver away from 48
>> >
>> >
>>
>> >
>
>>
